Notebooks
=========

We provide with a series of notebooks that follows the philosophy of generating learning material that address different aspect of learning a new software package.

|notebooks_ph|

.. warning::
    For better performance and more enjoyable experience, we recommend the installation of Jupyter Notebook using Anaconda.

Tutorials
---------
This set of notebooks are meant to explain of the tools within AQiPT.


How to guides
-------------
This set of notebooks are meant to explain the different tasks and specific processes that can be done with the tools in AQiPT.


Explanatory examples
--------------------
This set of notebooks are meant to develop a series of use-cases that can be realize with AQiPT, focus more in the application in self rather than the tools or the how-to.
